scripts.verison:patch: npm version patch && cd projects/zmaterial/ && npm version patch && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.verison:minor: npm version minor && cd projects/zmaterial/ && npm version minor && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.verison:major: npm version major && cd projects/zmaterial/ && npm version major && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish: cd dist/zmaterial/ && npm publish && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.dist:patch: npm run verison:patch && npm run postversion && npm run build:prod && npm run publish
scripts.dist:minor: npm run verison:minor && npm run postversion && npm run build:prod && npm run publish
scripts.dist:major: npm run verison:major && npm run postversion && npm run build:prod && npm run publish
